# LIBERTY STATION Rules
Space Station 14 is a story driven game. Many rules are designed to require roleplay, and not all rules are nessecarily intuitive. Game admins will treat you as if you have read the rules, even if you have not.
## RULE LIST
These apply at all times, including between rounds.
- [textlink="1. SCRUNGUS CLAUSE" link="RuleC1"] - [textlink="2. Zero Tolerance Rules" link="RuleC2"] - [textlink="3. General Etiquette" link="RuleC3"] - [textlink="4. In-Game & Roleplay Rules" link="RuleC4"] - [textlink="5. Silicon Rules" link="RuleC5"] - [textlink="6. Security & Command Rules" link="RuleC6"]
